import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { filterPriceFromAction, filterPriceToAction, filterProductsAction, sortProductsAction } from '../../store/productsReducer'; function Filtration() { let dispatch = useDispatch(); const formRef = useRef() function setMinMaxPrice(e){ console.log(formRef, e.target) if (e.code == 'Enter'){ console.log('etst') let data = new FormData(formRef.current) data = Object.fromEntries(data) data.max_price = (!data.max_price) ? Infinity : data.max_price data.min_price = (!data.min_price) ? -Infinity : data.min_price dispatch(filterProductsPriceAction(data)) } } return (

dispatch(filterPriceFromAction(e.target.value))}/> dispatch(filterPriceToAction(e.target.value))} />
